statements: SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE status = 'Successful'
SELECT payment_date, status FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT AVG(amount) as average_amount FROM payments
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_payment FROM payments WHERE status = 'processed'
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, log_message FROM payment_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'credit card';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT * FROM payment_logs
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, MIN(timestamp) AS first_log_time, MAX(timestamp) AS last_log_time FROM payment_logs
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_url FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status='Success';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT gateway_id, gateway_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM payment_gateways LEFT JOIN transactions ON payment_gateways.gateway_id = transactions.gateway_id GROUP BY gateway_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, payment_type FROM payment_methods ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT payment_type, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM payment_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentTransactions
SELECT user_id, amount FROM PaymentTransactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT last_name, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT method_name, description FROM PaymentMethods
SELECT gateway_name FROM PaymentGateways
SELECT * FROM PaymentTransactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT method_name, description FROM PaymentMethods WHERE method_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT transaction_id, log_message FROM TransactionLogs INNER JOIN PaymentTransactions ON TransactionLogs.transaction_id = PaymentTransactions.transaction_id
SELECT * FROM PaymentGateways WHERE gateway_name LIKE '%paypal%'
